head.title: Baked Party Ham with Bourbon and Pineapple

directions.step:
Preheat oven to 350f. Score ham in diamond pattern and insert cloves in the crossed points and pat brown sugar over top. Place in shallow baking pan and cook for 30 minutes. Heat pineapple, juice and marmalade together over low heat. Remove pan from heat and add bourbon. Baste frequently for 1 1/2 hours.
NOTES : Serve with breads, mustards,etc.
